long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
â— Introduction
ğŸš€ My ChatGPT Sidebar is a powerful Chrome extension that provides easy access to chatgpt.com. It uses chatgpt.com instead of OpenAI, making it completely free to use, and allows you to quickly get assistance from AI. This extension is designed to maximize productivity and enhance the user experience.

â— Key Features
ğŸ–¥ï¸ Sidebar Function
You can chat with ChatGPT using the sidebar without leaving your current tab. The sidebar automatically saves the size you set, so you don't need to adjust it every time.

âœï¸ Content Creation and Idea Generation
Quickly and easily create content and brainstorm ideas with AI assistance. This tool is ideal for writers, researchers, marketers, and anyone who needs instant AI support.

ğŸ“ Size Adjustment Function
Easily adjust the size of the sidebar, and the changes are automatically saved. You can maintain your preferred size without the hassle of constant adjustments.

ğŸšª Popup Window and Close Button
The extension provides easy access to ChatGPT through a popup window. You can use the popup window alongside your current screen and close it easily with the close button.

ğŸ”„ State Retention During Browsing
Even while browsing, you can get instant ChatGPT support. The buttons are automatically reinserted after refreshing or changing pages, allowing for a seamless experience.

â— Why Choose It?
âœ”ï¸ Free ChatGPT Sidebar
âœ”ï¸ Instant AI support to maximize productivity
âœ”ï¸ Auto-size saving for more convenient use
âœ”ï¸ Ideal tool for writers, researchers, and anyone needing AI support during browsing
âœ”ï¸ Popup window and close button for customized control


Install My ChatGPT Sidebar now and easily harness the power of AI! ğŸ”—
